eas_text: A civil authority has issued A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Davidson, TN; at 08:59 PM ON JAN 25, 2026 Effective until 01:59 AM JAN 26, 2026. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: 3 Overnight Warming Shelters Available: Fairgrounds, Expo 1: 401 Wingrove St; Madison Community Ctr: 550 N. Dupont Ave; SE Community Ctr: 5260 Hickory Hollow Pkwy.
